protocol.name: P-TABM-2390
protocol.text: RNA was isolated using from whole plants using Trizol reagent as recommended by the manufacturer.

protocol.name: P-TABM-2391
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seeds were sown directly on potting medium, stratified for 3 days at 4°C and grown for 11 days at 20°C under long day conditions (16 hr light/8 hr dark) at a photon flux density of 90 μmol m-2 sec-1. Seedlings were then transferred to 3.5 inches or 1.5 inches pots containing potting medium and grown under the same conditions as described above.

protocol.name: P-TABM-2392
protocol.text: The Affymetrix in vitro transcription protocol was followed.

protocol.name: P-TABM-2393
protocol.text: The different hybridization were normalized using RMA Express (version 0.2) providing a single file for all hybridizations.

protocol.name: P-TABM-2394
protocol.text: Wild type Col O Arabidopsis plants (named G1 on array) and lipocalin KO plants in Col O background (named G2 on array) were grown at normal temperature as described under growth conditions (temperature T1). For low temperature treament, 3 week-old plants (Col O or KO plants) were transferred to 4°C for 7 days under short day conditions (8 hr photoperiod and a photon flux density of 90 μmol m-2 sec-1) (temperature T2). Four treatment conditions are used for RNA extraction and array hybridization: G1T1, G1T2, G2T1 and G2T2. For each treatment, three biological replicates were prepared (A, B and C).
